channel.title: Discord Bot on Enigma
channel.description: Recent content in Discord Bot on Enigma

item.title: Xfoliating Disingenuity
item.description: .image-center{ display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } The idea actually reached it’s inception during my time working on the Covindia website, when I was discussing stuff with Srikar. The first thing you notice when you text him is his “substantial” use of the phrase “xD”. So yes, you can pretty much figure out the next course of action: make a bot that reacts to every xD it encounters until it annoys the sugar honey iced tea out of them.
